description: This file defines the AppNotification class, a data model representing notifications within the application, including methods for serialization and deserialization to and from maps.

classes.name: AppNotification
classes.description: A data model class representing a notification in the system, with fields for id, title, description, creation time, and read status, along with methods for mapping to and from a map structure.

methods.name: AppNotification.fromMap
methods.description: Factory constructor that creates an AppNotification instance from a map, parsing fields accordingly.

methods.name: toMap
methods.description: Serializes the AppNotification instance into a map suitable for storage or transfer.
